name: UnleashCuriosity
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily facts
des:
Ask for Space Facts, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter.

Space Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, open daily Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
